title: a pleasant surprise
review:
A beautiful movie. A pleasant surprise.
You must see it if you like road trip movies and nice music

title: Fun Movie You'll Want to See Again and Again
review: This film has everything you can ask for - adventure, comedy and drama- and not a dull moment in between plus 10 original songs! Fun movie you'll want to watch over and over. Based on a true story. I highly recommend it!

title: Finding your roots has never been this funny
review: A movie about finding your roots, it is a heartfelt comedy and drama at the same time, very entertaining, the lead actors are amazing and have great comedic sync. I read a comment about bad stereotypes of Mexico and was a bit discouraged, but the person writing that review did not get it at all, the movie goes way past the rough surface of Mexico and into how Mexico inspires ...
